column4: hi, as I start mathematica, windows titles and borders disappear for a while, then metacity redraws them
metacity just died and was restarted
I use the last metacity version in hoary
that's current. Try to get a coredump, the developers tend not to have mathematica to reproduce the bug.
how can I get a coredump?
login on the console, ulimit -c unlimited, startx.
should be in your home directory
I have to go now, see you later?
depends when you get back, but I'm not the only one who knows what "core dump" means here ;-)
